00022 /**
00023  * @file   DiskIntensityMart.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Apr  7 07:15:21 PDT 2008
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Class for encapsulating microarray data and storing it on disk in a
00028  * reasonable way to reduce memory impact. Key idea is to reorganize the data on
00029  * disk in the order which it will be used by the application to avoid lots of
00030  * seeks. Hopefully with a small number of seeks the performance impact of
00031  * on-disk stoarage will be minimal.
00032  */
00033

00053 // int DiskIntensityMart::m_cache_misses = 0;
00054 
00055 DiskIntensityMart::DiskIntensityMart(const std::vector<int>& layoutOrder,
00056                                      const std::vector<std::string>& celNames,
00057                                      int cacheSize, 
00058                                      const std::string& tempDir,
00059                                      const std::string& tempPrefix,
00060                                      bool storeAllCelIntensities)
00061 {
00062   m_CacheProbeSize = cacheSize;
00063   m_CacheStart = -1;
00064   m_CacheEnd = -1;
00065   m_Cache.resize(celNames.size());  // not necessary to set this here
00066   m_DeleteFilesWhenFinished = true;
00067   m_TempDir = tempDir;
00068   m_CelFiles = celNames;
00069   m_Flushed = false;
00070   m_NumChips = 0;
00071   m_TempPrefix = tempPrefix;
00072   m_StoreAllCelIntensities = storeAllCelIntensities;
00073 
00074   m_File5 = NULL;
00075   m_File5Name = "";
00076 
00077   if ( !Fs::dirExists(m_TempDir) ) {
00078     Fs::mkdirPath(m_TempDir, false);
00079   }
00080   GlobalTmpFileFactory()->setTmpdir(m_TempDir);
00081   m_File5Name = GlobalTmpFileFactory()->genFilename(tempPrefix, ".a5");
00082 
00083   m_AnalysisOrder = layoutOrder;
00084   m_ExpectedChips = celNames.size();
00085   m_Size = 0;
00086   m_UniqueAnalysisOrderSize = 0;
00087   m_useAuxMemCache = false;
00088 }
00089 
00090 /**
00091  * @brief Basic destructor
00092  */
00093 DiskIntensityMart::~DiskIntensityMart() {
00094   for (int i = 0; i < m_TmpVectors.size(); i++) {
00095     m_TmpVectors[i]->close();
00096     delete m_TmpVectors[i];
00097   }  
00098   deleteTmpfile();
00099 }

00104  * @param diskMart - DiskIntensityMart to be copied
00105  */
00106 DiskIntensityMart::DiskIntensityMart(DiskIntensityMart& diskMart) {
00107   m_TempDir = diskMart.m_TempDir;
00108   m_TempPrefix = diskMart.m_TempPrefix;
00109   m_CacheProbeSize = diskMart.m_CacheProbeSize;
00110   m_CacheStart = -1;
00111   m_CacheEnd = -1;
00112   m_Cache.resize(diskMart.m_CelFiles.size());
00113   m_DeleteFilesWhenFinished = diskMart.m_DeleteFilesWhenFinished;
00114   m_CelFiles = diskMart.m_CelFiles;
00115   m_Flushed = diskMart.m_Flushed;
00116   m_NumChips = diskMart.m_NumChips;
00117   m_StoreAllCelIntensities = diskMart.m_StoreAllCelIntensities;
00118   m_File5 = diskMart.m_File5;
00119   m_File5Name = diskMart.m_File5Name;
00120   m_AnalysisOrder = diskMart.m_AnalysisOrder;
00121   m_Order = diskMart.m_Order;
00122   m_ExpectedChips = diskMart.m_ExpectedChips;
00123   m_Map = diskMart.m_Map;
00124   m_ChipChannelToCacheMap = diskMart.m_ChipChannelToCacheMap;
00125   m_CacheProbeSize = diskMart.m_CacheProbeSize;
00126   m_Size = diskMart.m_Size;
00127   m_UniqueAnalysisOrderSize = 0;
00128   m_AuxMemCache = diskMart.m_AuxMemCache;
00129 
00130   for (int i = 0; i < diskMart.m_NumChips; i++) {
00131     std::vector<float> temp = diskMart.getCelData(i);
00132     setProbeIntensity(i, temp);
00133   }
00134 }

00151 
00152 float DiskIntensityMart::fromCache(probeid_t pIx, chipid_t chipIx) const {
00153   if(m_Map[pIx] < 0) {
00154     Err::errAbort("DiskIntensityMart::fromCache() - Illegal value in map for probeIx: " + ToStr(pIx));
00155   }
00156   if (m_TmpVectors[chipIx] == NULL) {
00157     Err::errAbort("DiskIntensityMart::fromCache() - Illegal read: No data has been written for chipIx: " +ToStr(chipIx));
00158   }
00159   float val = m_Cache[chipIx][m_Map[pIx] - m_CacheStart];
00160   return val;
00161 }
00162 
00163 bool DiskIntensityMart::inCache(probeid_t pIx, chipid_t chipIx) const {
00164   if(m_Map[pIx] >= m_CacheStart && m_Map[pIx] < m_CacheEnd) {
00165     return true;
00166   }
00167   return false;
00168 }

00182 int DiskIntensityMart::getChannelCount() const {
00183   if (m_ChipChannelToCacheMap.empty())
00184     return(1); // 1 channel
00185   else
00186     return(m_ChipChannelToCacheMap[0].size()); // number of channels assumed same for all chips

00222 // DiskIntensityMart* DiskIntensityMart::copyMetaDataToEmptyMart(const std::string tempPrefix, const std::string tempDir) const {
00223 //   std::string new_tempDir(tempDir);
00224 //   if (new_tempDir.empty()) {

00232 DiskIntensityMart* DiskIntensityMart::copyMetaDataToEmptyMart() const {
00233   DiskIntensityMart* newMart = new DiskIntensityMart(m_AnalysisOrder, m_CelFiles, m_CacheProbeSize, m_TempDir, m_TempPrefix, m_StoreAllCelIntensities);
00234   
00235   newMart->m_Order = m_Order;

00243 std::string DiskIntensityMart::getFile5Name() const {
00244   if (m_File5Name=="") {
00245     m_File5Name = Fs::join(m_TempDir,m_TempPrefix+".a5");

00250 void DiskIntensityMart::openCacheFileToRead() const {
00251   m_TmpVectors.resize(m_NumChips);
00252   for(int i = 0; i < m_NumChips; i++) {
00253     if (m_TmpVectors[i] != NULL) {
00254       m_TmpVectors[i] = m_File5->openVector(ToStr(i), affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT, affx::FILE5_RW);
00255     }
00256   }
00257 }
00258 
00259 void DiskIntensityMart::closeTmpfile() const {
00260   if (m_File5!=NULL) {
00261     m_File5->close();
00262     delete m_File5;
00263     m_File5=NULL;
00264   }
00265 }
00266 
00267 void DiskIntensityMart::deleteTmpfile() const {
00268   // should be closed before deleting it.
00269   closeTmpfile();
00270   //
00271   if(m_DeleteFilesWhenFinished) {
00272     if (m_File5Name!="") {
00273       if(Fs::rm(m_File5Name, false) != APT_OK)  {
00274         // Can't throw an exception from destructor...
00275         Verbose::warn(0, "DiskIntensityMart::deleteTmpfile()"
00276                       " - Error can't delete file: " + m_File5Name);
00277       }
00278     }
00279   }
00280 }
00281 
00282 
00283 float DiskIntensityMart::getProbeIntensity(probeid_t pIx, chipid_t chipIx, unsigned int channelIx) const {
00284 //   if(!m_Flushed) {
00285 //     openCacheFileToRead();
00286 //     m_Flushed = true;
00287 //   }
00288 
00289   assert(pIx < m_Map.size() && pIx >= 0);
00290   assert(m_Map[pIx] >= 0);
00291 
00292   int cacheIx;
00293   if (m_ChipChannelToCacheMap.empty()) {
00294     cacheIx = chipIx;
00295   }
00296   else {
00297     cacheIx = m_ChipChannelToCacheMap[chipIx][channelIx];
00298   }
00299 
00300   if (!(cacheIx < m_NumChips && cacheIx >= 0)) {
00301     Verbose::out(1, ToStr("cacheIx: ") + ToStr(cacheIx));
00302     Verbose::out(1, ToStr("m_NumChips: ") + ToStr(m_NumChips));
00303   }
00304   assert(cacheIx < m_NumChips && cacheIx >= 0 && m_TmpVectors[cacheIx] != NULL);
00305   float rtnVal = -1.0;
00306   if (m_AuxMemCache.size() > cacheIx && 
00307       m_AuxMemCache[cacheIx].find(pIx) != m_AuxMemCache[cacheIx].end()) {
00308     std::map<int,float>::const_iterator result = m_AuxMemCache[cacheIx].find(pIx);
00309     rtnVal = result->second;
00310   }
00311   else {
00312     if (!inCache(pIx,cacheIx)) {
00313       loadIntoCache(pIx, cacheIx);
00314     }
00315     rtnVal = fromCache(pIx, cacheIx);
00316   }
00317   return rtnVal;
00318 }
00319 
00320 
00321 void DiskIntensityMart::setProbeIntensity(const int dataIdx, const std::vector<float> &data) {
00322 
00323   assert(data.size() > 0);
00324 
00325   if (m_Map.size() == 0) {
00326     // initialize map and prune AnalysisOrder of duplicate ids
00327     /// @todo - Could be more probes in the layout than the cel file if probes used in more than one probeset. Can we optimize that somehow?
00328     probeidx_t probeCount = data.size();
00329 
00330     m_Order.reserve(probeCount);
00331     /// Make the mapping from cel file position to position in the optimized format
00332     m_Map.resize(probeCount);
00333 
00334     fill(m_Map.begin(), m_Map.end(), -1);
00335     fill(m_Order.begin(), m_Order.end(), -1);
00336 
00337     int indexCount = 0;
00338     int i;
00339     for (i = 0; i < m_AnalysisOrder.size(); i++) {
00340       int probeIndex = m_AnalysisOrder[i]; 
00341       // APT-512, 2010/01/10
00342       // probeIndex comes back as -1 in Windows and has to be checked. 
00343       // The problem differs between when Cgwin and DOS. 
00344       // m_AnalysisOrder is returning -1 In DOS on the very last probe set
00345       // but not for Cygwin. 
00346       if (probeIndex >= 0) {
00347         if (m_Map[probeIndex] == -1) {
00348           m_Order.push_back(probeIndex);
00349           m_Map[probeIndex] = indexCount++;
00350         }
00351         else if (m_useAuxMemCache) {  
00352           // this probeIndex has already been seen.  store its id for so that
00353           // later its intensity can be stored in memory
00354           m_AuxMemCache.resize(1);
00355           m_AuxMemCache[0].insert(std::pair<int,float>(probeIndex,-1.0));
00356         }
00357       }
00358     }
00359     // store the size of the analysis order after any duplicate probes
00360     // ids have been removed.
00361     m_UniqueAnalysisOrderSize = m_Order.size();
00362     if (m_StoreAllCelIntensities && probeCount > m_Order.size()) {
00363       // probe intensities that are not in m_AnalysisOrder are tacked
00364       // onto the end of m_Order.  in this way, m_AnalysisOrder probe
00365       // intensities will be cached efficiently, and yet
00366       // non-m_AnalysisOrder probe intensities will still be available
00367       // in the diskmart.
00368       for (i = 0; i < probeCount; i++) {
00369         if (m_Map[i] == -1) {
00370           m_Order.push_back(i);
00371           m_Map[i] = indexCount++;
00372         }
00373       }
00374     }
00375     m_Size = m_Order.size();
00376   }
00377 
00378   if (m_File5 == NULL) {
00379     m_File5 = new File5_File();
00380     m_File5->open(getFile5Name(), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00381   }
00382 
00383   if (dataIdx >= m_NumChips) {
00384     m_NumChips = dataIdx + 1;
00385     m_TmpVectors.resize(m_NumChips, NULL);
00386     m_TmpVectors[dataIdx] = m_File5->openVector(ToStr(dataIdx), affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT, affx::FILE5_RW);
00387     // make copies of aux memory cache for each dataset
00388     if (m_AuxMemCache.size() > 0) {
00389       m_AuxMemCache.resize(m_NumChips);
00390       m_AuxMemCache[dataIdx] = m_AuxMemCache[0];
00391     }
00392   }
00393   affx::File5_Vector *tmpVec = m_TmpVectors[dataIdx];
00394   std::map<int,float>* auxMemCache = NULL;
00395   if (dataIdx < m_AuxMemCache.size()) {
00396     auxMemCache = &(m_AuxMemCache[dataIdx]);
00397   }
00398   writeReorderedData(m_Order, data, tmpVec, auxMemCache);
00399 }
00400 
00401 
00402 void DiskIntensityMart::writeReorderedData(const std::vector<int> &order, const std::vector<float>& data, File5_Vector *f5, std::map<int,float>* auxMemCache) {
00403   std::vector<float> reorderedData;
00404 
00405   int write_data_size = data.size();
00406   if (!m_StoreAllCelIntensities &&
00407       write_data_size > m_UniqueAnalysisOrderSize) {
00408     write_data_size = m_UniqueAnalysisOrderSize;
00409   }
00410 
00411   // store intensities for duplicated probes in special cache
00412   for(int i = 0; i < write_data_size; i++) {
00413     if(order[i] >=0) {
00414       reorderedData.push_back(data[order[i]]);
00415       if (auxMemCache != NULL) {
00416         std::map<int,float>::iterator result = auxMemCache->find(order[i]);
00417         if (result != auxMemCache->end()) {
00418           result->second = data[order[i]]; 
00419         }
00420       }
00421     }
00422   }
00423 
00424   reorderedData.reserve(order.size());
00425   APT_ERR_ASSERT(reorderedData.size()==write_data_size,"internal error.");
00426 
00427   f5->resize(reorderedData.size());
00428   int written = f5->write_array(0, reorderedData.size(), &reorderedData[0]);
00429   assert(written == reorderedData.size() );
00430 }
00431 
00432 
00433 void DiskIntensityMart::loadIntoCache(probeid_t pIx, chipid_t chipIx) const {
00434   // cache debug statements
00435 //   cout << "probeId: " << pIx+1 << '\t';
00436 //   cout << "index: " << m_Map[pIx] << '\t';
00437 //   cout << "cache start: " << m_CacheStart << '\t';
00438 //   cout << "cache end: " << m_CacheEnd << '\n';
00439   int nRows = m_CacheProbeSize / m_TmpVectors.size();
00440   if (m_CacheProbeSize > static_cast<uint64_t>(m_Size * m_NumChips)) {
00441     nRows = m_Size;
00442   }
00443   int startIx = m_Map[pIx];
00444   if(startIx < 0) {
00445     Err::errAbort("DiskIntensityMart::loadIntoCache() - Can't have probe with no position info, did you use the right ChipLayout?");
00446   }
00447   int endIx = startIx + nRows;
00448   // Make sure the cache is valid
00449   if(m_Cache.size() != m_TmpVectors.size()) {
00450     m_Cache.resize(m_TmpVectors.size());
00451   }
00452   // Read the values from each data file into the cache.
00453   for(int cIx = 0; cIx < m_TmpVectors.size(); cIx++) {
00454     if (m_TmpVectors[cIx] != NULL) {
00455       m_Cache[cIx].resize(nRows);
00456       // Blank out any existing values
00457       fill(m_Cache[cIx].begin(), m_Cache[cIx].end(), -1.0f);
00458       File5_Vector *f5 = m_TmpVectors[cIx];
00459       int size = min((int)m_Cache[cIx].size(), (int)f5->size() - startIx);
00460       f5->read_array(startIx, size, &m_Cache[cIx][0]);
00461     }
00462   }
00463   m_CacheStart = startIx;
00464   m_CacheEnd = endIx;
00465 }
00466 
00467 
00468 probeidx_t DiskIntensityMart::getProbeCountFromCel(const std::string &celFile) {
00469   std::string tmp_unc_name=Fs::convertToUncPath(celFile);
00470   FusionCELData cel;
00471   cel.SetFileName(tmp_unc_name.c_str());
00472   probeidx_t result = -1;
00473   try {
00474     if(!cel.Read()) 
00475       Err::errAbort("\nDiskIntensityMart::getProbeCountFromCel() - Can't read cel file: " + cel.GetFileName() + 
00476                     "\n>>> Error reported: " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(cel.GetError()));
00477     result = cel.GetRows() * cel.GetCols();
00478     cel.Close();
00479   }
00480   catch (...) {
00481     Err::errAbort("\nDiskIntensityMart::getProbeCountFromCel() - Can't read cel file: " + cel.GetFileName() + "\n");
00482   }
00483   return result;
00484 }
00485 
00486 std::vector<float> DiskIntensityMart::getCelData(int dataSetIx) {
00487   assert(dataSetIx < m_NumChips && dataSetIx >= 0);
00488   File5_Vector *f5 = m_TmpVectors[dataSetIx];
00489   std::vector<float> data(f5->size());
00490   f5->read_vector(0, &data);
00491   std::vector<float> origOrderedData(m_Map.size());
00492   for (int i = 0; i < m_Map.size(); i++) {
00493     origOrderedData[i] = data[m_Map[i]];
00494   }
00495   return origOrderedData;
00496 }
00497 
00498 std::vector<float> DiskIntensityMart::getCelData(chipid_t celIx, unsigned int channelIx) {
00499   int dataSetIx = 0;
00500   // convert celname index to cache index, if a mapping exists
00501   if (m_ChipChannelToCacheMap.empty()) {
00502     if (channelIx == 0) {
00503       dataSetIx = celIx;
00504     }
00505     else {
00506       Err::errAbort("\nDiskIntensityMart::getCelData - Accessing CEL data with multi-channel index when no multi-channel data is available.");
00507     }
00508   }
00509   else {
00510     assert(celIx >= 0 && celIx < m_ChipChannelToCacheMap.size());
00511     assert(channelIx >= 0 && channelIx < m_ChipChannelToCacheMap[celIx].size());
00512     dataSetIx = m_ChipChannelToCacheMap[celIx][channelIx];
00513   }
00514   std::vector<float> data = getCelData(dataSetIx);
00515   return data;
00516 }
